amendment.description: To impose an economic sanction on foreign countries that owe property taxes to Washington, D.C. or New York City.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1188 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1188 proposed by Senator Clinton for Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9194-9195; text: CR S9194-9195) To impose an economic sanction on foreign countries that owe property taxes to Washington, D.C. or New York City.
